name: Dungeon Diner
description:
• Pre-Alpha Build
  • What is Dungeon Diner?
    • Dungeon Diner is a game where you play as a new chef in a fantasy diner, slaying food-based monsters for their tasty ingredients.
    • Game details:
      • Top-down twin-stick shooter
      • Momentum based physics
      • Slay monster, collect ingredient drops, and deliver to chef
      • Upgrade character and weapons in between levels
  • DEMO CONTROLS: 
    • Move - WASD
    • Aim - Mouse
    • Left weapon - Left-click
    • Right weapon - Right-click
    • Jump - Space
    • Switch between demo levels - Left bracket "["
  • NOTES:
    • The current player model is just a placeholder.
  • FEEDBACK FORM:
    • If you played our game please share your thoughts with us!
    • https://forms.gle/qEfCNrJ6gNuTKjdw6
